name: DELETE!
description:
DISCLAIMER: The Windows version doesn't scale 100% correctly, try to use the WebGL version instead.

BRIEF SUMMARY: Your name is Nick. You recently found software that can be used to transport human consciousness into the internet. Delete all of the files to gain more points and save the world!

THEME: The theme was Less is More. In this game, the less files remain, the more points you gain! (Hey that rhymes! ^0^)

INFO: This game (art, code, fonts, music) were made in less than 1 week for the BlackThornProd GJ #3!

Have fun, and get deleting!
